ModDescription: Adds multiple Cartography related features to the game, such as custom waypoint icons, GPS, auto waypoint markers, and more.
error-messages.feature-not-available-cli: This feature is not available from the client. Please use the equivalent server command instead.
error-messages.mod-not-installed-on-serv: Campaign Cartographer is not installed on the Server. Please ask your server administrator to install Campaign Cartographer on the server, for added functionality.
error-messages.feature-disabled: The server administrator has disabled this feature.
error-messages.error-occured: An error occured while executing the command.
